Dickson, Alexa Dufraisse, Michael J. Kaiser, Geneviève M.-J. Lécrivain, Ursula Maier, Sebastian Million, Helmut Müller, Christina Vieth, Richard Vogt, Helmut Schlichtherle, Elisabeth Stephan, Martin Wessels, Lucia Wick und Ingrid Wiesner.

Accompanying CD-ROM in pocket attached to inside back cover contains : Die Silexartefakte vom Degersee im Kontext des südwestdeutschen Jungneolithikums von Christina Vieth, Tab. 1: Zusammenstellung aller Nichtbaumpollen in den verschiedenen Pollenzonen der on-site Profile, Tab. 3: Alphabetische Fundliste aller nachgewiesenen Pflanzenreste aus De I und De II.
Editor: Landesamt für Denkmalpflege im Regierungspräsidium Stuttgart -- title page verso.

Herausgeber: Thomas Stöllner, Klaus Oeggl ; Übersetzungen: Thomas Timlin.
In Kommission bei VML Verlag Marie Leidorf,
Veröffentlichungen aus dem Deutschen Bergbau-Museum Bochum,

本书以图文并茂的形式, 较系统地梳理了甘肃古塔的发展脉络, 说明了甘肃古塔概况. 全书内容包括三部分. 第一部分为甘肃古塔概论, 第二部分为甘肃古塔基本资料, 第三部分是附录.

marc:datafield.marc:subfield: Institute for the Study of the Ancient World,

datafield.subfield: Anyue shi ku Yuan jue dong bao hu yan jiu /

Sichuan Sheng wen wu ju, Deguo Munihei gong ye da xue, Chengdu wen wu kao gu yan jiu suo bian zhu = Conservation and research for Yuanjuedong of Anyue Grottos / edited by Sichuan Cultural Relics Administration, Technische Universität München, Federal Republic of Germany, Chengdu Institute of Archaeology.
Conservation and research for Yuanjuedong of Anyue Grottos
In Chinese; partly in German and English.
Chengdu wen wu kao gu yan jiu suo,
安岳石窟圆觉洞保护研究 /

四川省文物局, 德国慕尼黑工业大学, 成都文物考古研究所编著 = Conservation and research for Yuanjuedong of Anyue Grottos / edited by Sichuan Cultural Relics Administration, Technische Universität München, Federal Republic of Germany, Chengdu Institute of Archaeology.
本书是四川省安岳石窟圆觉洞保护研究的报告.这本报告中,涵盖了四川省各家参与单位以及中国文化遗产研究院的研究成果,也包括了德国巴伐利亚州各家参与单位和海德堡科学院的研究成果;涉及了地质勘查,材料科学和建筑工程学等自然学科,历史考古和艺术研究等人文科学;不仅有文物保护科学的基础研究,也有防治对策和修复工艺的实践.

marc:datafield.marc:subfield: Institute for the Study of the Ancient World,

datafield.subfield: 1973-1978 nian kao gu fa jue bao gao /
Guangdong Sheng wen wu kao gu yan jiu suo, Guangdong Sheng bo wu guan, Guangdong Sheng Shaoguan Shi Qujiang Qu bo wu guan bian zhu.
1973-1978 nian kao gu fa jue bao gao
Guangdong Sheng wen wu kao gu yan jiu suo,
Guangdong Sheng Shaoguan Shi Qujiang Qu bo wu guan,
广东省文物考古研究所, 广东省博物馆, 广东省韶关市曲江区博物馆编著.

本书是华南重要古文化遗址石峡遗址的考古发掘报告. 石峡遗址位于广东省韶关市曲江区, 自1973年至1978年底三次发掘, 发现大量的房址, 灰坑, 窑址等文化遗迹, 清理墓葬132座, 出土各类文化遗物一万多件, 为研究广东新石器时代至青铜时代的内涵特征, 年代分期及其与有关文化的关系, 探索我国原始社会的解体和阶段性的发展过程等社会历史问题提供了极为重要的, 典型的实物资料, 被评为20世纪中国百年百大考古发现之一. 这本考古报告资料翔实, 图文并茂, 具有高度的资料价值和学术意义.
广东省文物考古研究所,
广东省韶关市曲江区博物馆,

marc:datafield.marc:subfield: Institute for the Study of the Ancient World,

datafield.subfield: Shenzhen Shi wen wu kao gu jian ding suo bian zhu = Xiantouling site in Shenzhen : report on the excavation in 2006 / Shenzhen Municipal Institute of Archaeology.
Shenzhen Shi wen wu kao gu jian ding suo,
深圳市文物考古鉴定所编著 = Xiantouling site in Shenzhen : report on the excavation in 2006 / Shenzhen Municipal Institute of Archaeology.
本书对2006年发掘深圳咸头岭遗址出土的遗存进行了全面介绍, 对咸头岭遗址以及珠江三角洲地区相关遗址出土的遗存进行了综合研究, 讨论了咸头岭文化与周边考古学文化的关系, 并对咸头岭遗址出土陶器, 石器的工艺以及生态环境与人们的谋生方式进行了探讨.
深圳市文物考古鉴定所,

datafield.subfield: black-and-white illustrations, black-and-white maps, black-and-white plans ;

Today, the Iranian world, which encompasses the whole Persian-speaking and culturally 'Persianate' region, including Afghanistan, Kurdistan, Tajikistan, parts of Central Asia and the Indian subcontinent, is a geopolitically sensitive region. But it is also a distinct cultural area with a rich and complex history, a mosaic of ethnic and religious groups, ancient languages and dialects, and sophisticated literatures. The essays in this volume address a broad range of questions from a variety of fields, including languages, literature, religions, history, anthropology, demography, sociology, medicine, art, and film. The first volume engages with the Iranian world before the rise of Islam.

datafield.subfield: by Robert Beekes ; with the assistance of Lucien van Beek.

A must-have research tool that should be on every classicist's desk. Greek is among the most intensely and widely studied languages known. Since the publication of the last etymological dictionary of Greek, both the reconstruction of Proto-Indo-European, and our knowledge of the Greek substrate have led to numerous, often surprising new insights into the history and formation of the Greek vocabulary.This dictionary is a treasure trove covering 2000 years of Ancient Greek: from Mycenaean via Homer and the classical period to lexicographers, such as Hesychius (5th century A.D.).It at last brings together all new data, resulting in scores of thoroughly revised etymologies. This is a truly indispensable tool for classicists in search of a deeper understanding of the Greek vocabulary, its history and, therewith, a better understanding of the language.

禹会村遗址与淮河流域文明研讨会
禹会村遗址与淮河流域文明研讨会论文集 /
中国社会科学院古代文明研究中心, 安徽省文化厅, 蚌埠市人民政府编著.
禹会村遗址与淮河流域文明研讨会论文集
本论文集是禹会村遗址与淮河流域文明研讨会的成果之一. 禹会村遗址的发掘, 经论证与大禹会诸侯事件相关, 为夏文化的探索, 中华文明探源研究具有重要意义. 本文集收录了与会专家的论文31篇, 涉及禹会村遗址年代、性质、器物的文化因素分析、古史传说、环境分析等一系列问题, 对探索中华文明起源等具有重要意义.
禹会村 (蚌埠市, 中国)

中国社会科学院考古研究所, 新疆维吾尔自治区阿克苏地区文物局, 拜城县文物局编著 = Duogang Cemetery of Baicheng County / by Institute of Archaeology, Chinese Academy of Social Sciences, Aksu Bureau of Cultural Relics, Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region, Bureau of Cultural Relics of Baicheng County.
中国田野考古报告集. 考古学专刊. 丁种 ;
本书讲1999年中国社会科学院考古所新疆队等发掘了拜城县多岗墓地100座墓, 大部分为圆丘封堆竖穴墓, 规模有大、中、小三类, 随葬品以陶器为主. 这个墓地的文化面貌和轮台群巴克墓地、拜城克孜尔墓地比较接近, 应属同个文化, 绝大部分为公元前1千纪前半期的墓葬 (公元前900-前500年) , 排列有一定规律, 可以进行分期研究, 将为塔里木盆地的考古学文化研究建立一个相对可靠的参考.
Zhongguo tian ye kao gu bao gao ji.

Text in Chinese; with abstract, table of contents and foreword also in English.
Center for the Art of East Asia,
峰峰矿区文物保管所, 芝加哥大学东亚艺术中心著.
响堂山石窟是中国北朝晚期规模最大, 最具代表性的石窟群, 其中尤以刻经洞的刻经及雕刻最为重要, 具有历史意义和研究价值. 本书详细报告了刻经, 造像的现存情况, 还将海外的资料补充进去, 并利用三维技术制作了石窟的复原图.

marc:datafield.marc:subfield: Institute for the Study of the Ancient World,

datafield.subfield: Die frühneolithischen und urukzeitlichen Silex- und Obsidianindustrien aus Tell Sheikh Hassan /

Die Publikation präsentiert die Silex- und Obsidiangeräte aus den frühneolithischen und urukzeitlichen Siedlungsschichten der deutschen Ausgrabungen in Tell Sheikh Hassan. Erstmals wird damit eine urukzeitliche Lithikassemblage monographisch präsentiert, wobei alle Gerätetypen auch hinsichtlich ihrer Funktionen ausführlich beschrieben werden. In der gleichen Ausführlichkeit erfolgt auch die Darstellung der frühneolithischen Lithikfunde im selben Band, da nachgewiesen werden konnte, dass bestimmte frühneolithische Gerätetypen ganz bewusst während der urukzeitlichen Besiedlung aufgesammelt und wiederverwendet wurden. Von großer Bedeutung ist darüber hinaus die Identifikation einiger in die protodynastische Zeit datierende Lithikgeräte ägyptischer Herkunft, womit erstmals der Nachweis ägyptischer Importe in die Urukregion erbracht wird.

datafield.subfield: Qin bing ma yong de kao gu fa xian yu yan jiu /
秦兵马俑的考古发现与研究 /
本书共分为十三章, 五十五个小节. 第一章为兵马俑的发现与发掘. 第二章至十三章共五十二个小节, 属于专题性的介绍和探讨, 阐释其文化内涵, 性质, 作用, 产生的时代背景及在中国文化史上的地位等许多问题.

"The origin for this volume is located in the International Donatist Studies Symposium which was held 17-18 May 2012 in Leuven, Belgium."--Introduction.
Donatism, the rediscoverd Christian legacy of Roman Africa /
Matthew Alan Gaumer, Anthony Dupont, Mathijs Lamberigts --
Numquid non et Africa sanctorum martyrum corporibus plena est? (Augustine, Ep. 78,3) : martyrs and martyrdom in Roman Africa--a preparation for Donatism? /
Donatists abound!!! : the polemical ressourcement of late antique villains in the mediaeval and early modern periods /
Some observations on the anti-Donatist legislation /
Recording and reporting the Gesta Collationis Carthaginensis : problems and solutions /
The ecclesiastical patrimony of the Donatist church /
Ab ipso patientia mea : Augustine's critique of Donatist martyrdom and his doctrine of grace /
In league with the devil? : Donatist and Catholic perspectives on pre-baptismal exsufflation /
Optatus and Parmenian on the authority of Cyprian /
An example of Pelagian exegesis in the Donatist Vienna homilies (Ö.N.B. lat. 417) /
The Catholic construction of Donatist key figures : a critical reading of Augustine and Optatus /
Hippo's got talent : Augustine's Psalmus contra partem Donati as a pop(ular) song /
Augustine, missionary to heretics? : an appraisal of Augustine's missional engagement with the Donatists /
Timor est servus caritatis (s. 156,13-14) : Augustine's vision on coercion in the process of returning heretics to the Catholic Church and his underlying principles /
Peccatum and gratia in Augustine's anti-Donatist Sermones ad Populum : attested presence and specific treatment of two key concepts of Augustine's anti-Pelagian doctrine /
Mysterium and sacramentum in the Vetus Afra : what differing interpretations by African patristic authors reveal about paganism and Donatism /

datafield.subfield: Hangzhou Jiang Cun gu qian bi jiao cang /
Hangzhou Shi wen wu kao gu yan jiu suo bian zhu.
Hangzhou Shi wen wu kao gu suo.
杭州市文物考古研究所编著.
本书为杭州蒋村古钱币窖藏出土铜钱图录. 该窖藏出土铜钱计37万余枚, 重1000余公斤, 时代自西汉迄明洪武, 种类丰富, 可辨有110余个品种. 铜钱保存较好, 钱文清晰.
杭州市文物考古研究所.

marc:datafield.marc:subfield: Institute for the Study of the Ancient World,

datafield.subfield: interactions between Rome and the peoples on the Arabian and Egyptian frontiers in Late Antiquity /
edited by Jitse H.F. Dijkstra & Greg Fisher.

"In recent years, exciting new discoveries of inscriptions and archaeological remains on the Arabian Peninsula have led to a re-evaluation of the peoples on the Arabian frontier, which through their extensive contacts with Rome and Persia are now seen as dynamic participants in the Late Antique world. The present volume contributes to this recent trend by focusing on the contrast between the 'outside' sources on the peoples of the frontier - the Roman view - and the 'inside' sources, that is, the precious material produced by the Arabs themselves, and by approaching these sources within an anthropological framework of how peripheral peoples face larger powers. For the first time, the situation on the Arabian frontier is also compared with that on the southern Egyptian frontier, where similar sources have been found of peoples such as the Blemmyes and Noubades. Thus, the volume offers a richly-documented examination of the frontier interactions in these two vibrant and critically-important areas of the Late Antique East."--
ISAW copy is from the Library of Nina Garsoïan.

marc:datafield.marc:subfield: Institute for the Study of the Ancient World,

datafield.subfield: I͡Uzhnyĭ Kavkaz v IX-II tys. do n.ė.
stages of cultural and socioeconomic development from the eighth to the second millennium B.C. /
K. Kh. Kushnareva ; translated by H.N. Michael.
Translation of: I͡Uzhnyĭ Kavkaz v IX-II tys. do n.ė.

The Epi-Paleolithic/Mesolithic (eighth to the sixth millennium B.C.) -- The Neolithic and Eneolithic (sixth to the middle of the fourth millennium B.C.) -- The Early Bronze Age (middle of the fourth to the third quarter of the third millennium B.C.) -- The Middle Bronze Age (last centuries of the third to the middle of the second millennium B.C.) -- Hunters, gatherers, and early agriculturists (eighth to the middle of the fourth millennium B.C.) -- Further developments in the economy of the population of the Caucasus (middle of the fourth to the end of the third millennium B.C.) -- Some particulars of the economy during the first half of the second millennium B.C.
ISAW copy is from the Library of Nina Garsoïan.

Institut istorii, arkheologii i ėtnografii narodov Dalʹnego Vostoka (Rossiĭskai͡a akademii͡a nauk),

吉林省文物考古研究所, 俄罗斯科学院远东分院远东民族历史・考古・民族研究所编著 ; 主编, 宋玉彬, Н.Г.阿尔杰米耶娃 ; 副主编, 解峰 = Древностей чжурчжэней из Приморского края России / Институт истории, археологии и этнографии народов Дальнего Востока ДВО РАН, Институт археологии провинции Цзилинь ; главные редакторы-составители Сун Юйбинь, Н.Г. datafield.subfield: Ma Duanlin zhu ; Shanghai shi fan da xue gu ji yan jiu suo, Hua dong shi fan da xue gu ji yan jiu suo dian jiao ; [dian jiao zhu chi ren Pei Rucheng, Dai Jianguo, Yan Wenru].
14 volumes ([10], 9672, 3, 3 pages, 4 unnumbered pages of plates :

"Wen xian tong kao" shi Song Yuan zhi ji zhu ming xue zhe Ma Duanlin de zhong yao zhu zuo, shu de nei rong qi zi shang gu, zhong yu Nan Song Ningzong Jiading nian jian. Quan shu gong 348 juan, fen wei 24 men, fen bie wei: tian fu, qian bi, hu kou, zhi yi, zheng que, shi di, tu gong, guo yong, xuan ju, xue xiao, zhi guan, jiao she, zong miao, wang li, yue, bing, xing, jing ji, di xi, feng jian, xiang wei, wu yi, yu di, si yi. "Tong dian', "Tong zhi" he "Wen xian tong kao" san shu dou yi guan tong gu jin wei zhu zhi, gu hou ren he zhi cheng wei "San tong". "San tong" zai Zhongguo gu dai shi ji zhong zhan you fei chang zhong yao de di wei, er "Wen xian tong kao"shi ji "Tong dian", "Tong zhi "zhi hou, gui mo zui da de yi bu ji shu li dai dian zhang zhi du de zhu zuo. Dian xiao ben "Wen xian tong kao", yi Qia long shi er nian (1747 nian) Wu ying dian jiao kan ben wei di ben, yi Yu Qian bu xiu ben (jian cheng Yuan ben), Shenduzhai ben (jian cheng Shen ben), Feng Tianyu ben (jian cheng Feng ben), Guangxu er shi er nian Zhejiang shu ju (Jian cheng ju ben) ke ben wei jiao ben, bing cha yue "Tong kao" suo yong de qi ta shu ji, xi shou jin ren jiao kan cheng guo, fan jiao zheng e wu zhi chu, yu juan mo xie chu jiao kan ji. Zhe yang yi bu li shi dian ji de dian jiao zheng li chu ban bi jiang da da fang bian xue jie dui "Wen xian tong kao" yi shu de shi yong he xiang guan ling yu de yan jiu.

v. 1. Tian fu, qian bi, hu kou, zhi yi, zheng que, shi di -- v. 2. Tu gong, guo yong, xuan ju, xue xiao -- v. 3. Zhi guan -- v. 4. Jiao she -- v. 5. Zong miao, wang li -- v. 6. Wang li -- v. 7. Le -- v. 8. Bing, xing -- v. 9-10. Jing ji -- v. 11. Di xi, feng jian -- v. 12. Xiang wei, wu yi -- v. 13. Wu yi, yu di -- v. 14. Si yi.
马端臨著 ; 上海師範大學古籍研究所, 華東師範大學古籍研究所點校 ; [點校主持人裴汝誠, 戴建國, 嚴文儒].

《文献通考》是宋元之际著名学者马端临的重要著作, 书的内容起自上古, 终于南宋宁宗嘉定年间.全书共348卷, 分为24门, 分别为: 田赋, 钱币, 戶口, 职役, 征榷, 市籴, 土贡, 国用, 选举, 学校, 职官, 郊社, 宗庙, 王礼, 乐, 兵, 刑, 经籍, 帝系, 封建, 象纬, 物异, 舆地, 四裔. 《通典》, 《通志》和《文献通考》三书都以贯通古今为主旨, 故后人合之称为"三通". "三通"在中国古代史籍中占有非常重要的地位, 而《文献通考》是继《通典》, 《通志》之后, 规模最大的一部记述历代典章制度的著作.点校本《文献通考》, 以乾隆十二年(一七四七年)武英殿校刊本为底本, 以余谦补修本(简称元本), 慎独斋本(简称慎本), 冯天驭本(简称冯本), 光绪二十二年浙江书局(简称局本)刻本为校本, 并查阅"通考"所用的其它书籍, 吸收近人校勘成果, 凡校正讹误之处, 于卷末写出校勘记. 这样一部历史典籍的点校整理出版必将大大方便学界对《文献通考》一书的使用和相关领域的研究.

v. 1. 田赋, 钱币, 戶口, 职役, 征榷, 市籴 -- v. 2. 土贡, 国用, 选举, 学校 -- v. 3. 职官 -- v. 4. 郊社 -- v. 5 宗庙, 王礼 -- v. 6 王礼 -- v. 7 乐 -- v. 8. 兵, 刑 -- v. 9-10. 经籍 -- v. 11. 帝系, 封建 -- v. 12. 象纬, 物异 -- v. 13. 物异, 舆地 -- v. 14 四裔.

datafield.subfield: Ma Duanlin zhu ; Shanghai shi fan da xue gu ji yan jiu suo, Hua dong shi fan da xue gu ji yan jiu suo dian jiao ; [dian jiao zhu chi ren Pei Rucheng, Dai Jianguo, Yan Wenru].
14 volumes ([10], 9672, 3, 3 pages, 4 unnumbered pages of plates :

"Wen xian tong kao" shi Song Yuan zhi ji zhu ming xue zhe Ma Duanlin de zhong yao zhu zuo, shu de nei rong qi zi shang gu, zhong yu Nan Song Ningzong Jiading nian jian. Quan shu gong 348 juan, fen wei 24 men, fen bie wei: tian fu, qian bi, hu kou, zhi yi, zheng que, shi di, tu gong, guo yong, xuan ju, xue xiao, zhi guan, jiao she, zong miao, wang li, yue, bing, xing, jing ji, di xi, feng jian, xiang wei, wu yi, yu di, si yi. "Tong dian', "Tong zhi" he "Wen xian tong kao" san shu dou yi guan tong gu jin wei zhu zhi, gu hou ren he zhi cheng wei "San tong". "San tong" zai Zhongguo gu dai shi ji zhong zhan you fei chang zhong yao de di wei, er "Wen xian tong kao"shi ji "Tong dian", "Tong zhi "zhi hou, gui mo zui da de yi bu ji shu li dai dian zhang zhi du de zhu zuo. Dian xiao ben "Wen xian tong kao", yi Qia long shi er nian (1747 nian) Wu ying dian jiao kan ben wei di ben, yi Yu Qian bu xiu ben (jian cheng Yuan ben), Shenduzhai ben (jian cheng Shen ben), Feng Tianyu ben (jian cheng Feng ben), Guangxu er shi er nian Zhejiang shu ju (Jian cheng ju ben) ke ben wei jiao ben, bing cha yue "Tong kao" suo yong de qi ta shu ji, xi shou jin ren jiao kan cheng guo, fan jiao zheng e wu zhi chu, yu juan mo xie chu jiao kan ji. Zhe yang yi bu li shi dian ji de dian jiao zheng li chu ban bi jiang da da fang bian xue jie dui "Wen xian tong kao" yi shu de shi yong he xiang guan ling yu de yan jiu.

v. 1. Tian fu, qian bi, hu kou, zhi yi, zheng que, shi di -- v. 2. Tu gong, guo yong, xuan ju, xue xiao -- v. 3. Zhi guan -- v. 4. Jiao she -- v. 5. Zong miao, wang li -- v. 6. Wang li -- v. 7. Le -- v. 8. Bing, xing -- v. 9-10. Jing ji -- v. 11. Di xi, feng jian -- v. 12. Xiang wei, wu yi -- v. 13. Wu yi, yu di -- v. 14. Si yi.

datafield.subfield: Ma Duanlin zhu ; Shanghai shi fan da xue gu ji yan jiu suo, Hua dong shi fan da xue gu ji yan jiu suo dian jiao ; [dian jiao zhu chi ren Pei Rucheng, Dai Jianguo, Yan Wenru].
14 volumes ([10], 9672, 3, 3 pages, 4 unnumbered pages of plates :

"Wen xian tong kao" shi Song Yuan zhi ji zhu ming xue zhe Ma Duanlin de zhong yao zhu zuo, shu de nei rong qi zi shang gu, zhong yu Nan Song Ningzong Jiading nian jian. Quan shu gong 348 juan, fen wei 24 men, fen bie wei: tian fu, qian bi, hu kou, zhi yi, zheng que, shi di, tu gong, guo yong, xuan ju, xue xiao, zhi guan, jiao she, zong miao, wang li, yue, bing, xing, jing ji, di xi, feng jian, xiang wei, wu yi, yu di, si yi. "Tong dian', "Tong zhi" he "Wen xian tong kao" san shu dou yi guan tong gu jin wei zhu zhi, gu hou ren he zhi cheng wei "San tong". "San tong" zai Zhongguo gu dai shi ji zhong zhan you fei chang zhong yao de di wei, er "Wen xian tong kao"shi ji "Tong dian", "Tong zhi "zhi hou, gui mo zui da de yi bu ji shu li dai dian zhang zhi du de zhu zuo. Dian xiao ben "Wen xian tong kao", yi Qia long shi er nian (1747 nian) Wu ying dian jiao kan ben wei di ben, yi Yu Qian bu xiu ben (jian cheng Yuan ben), Shenduzhai ben (jian cheng Shen ben), Feng Tianyu ben (jian cheng Feng ben), Guangxu er shi er nian Zhejiang shu ju (Jian cheng ju ben) ke ben wei jiao ben, bing cha yue "Tong kao" suo yong de qi ta shu ji, xi shou jin ren jiao kan cheng guo, fan jiao zheng e wu zhi chu, yu juan mo xie chu jiao kan ji. Zhe yang yi bu li shi dian ji de dian jiao zheng li chu ban bi jiang da da fang bian xue jie dui "Wen xian tong kao" yi shu de shi yong he xiang guan ling yu de yan jiu.

v. 1. Tian fu, qian bi, hu kou, zhi yi, zheng que, shi di -- v. 2. Tu gong, guo yong, xuan ju, xue xiao -- v. 3. Zhi guan -- v. 4. Jiao she -- v. 5. Zong miao, wang li -- v. 6. Wang li -- v. 7. Le -- v. 8. Bing, xing -- v. 9-10. Jing ji -- v. 11. Di xi, feng jian -- v. 12. Xiang wei, wu yi -- v. 13. Wu yi, yu di -- v. 14. Si yi.
马端臨著 ; 上海師範大學古籍研究所, 華東師範大學古籍研究所點校 ; [點校主持人裴汝誠, 戴建國, 嚴文儒].

14 volumes ([10], 9672, 3, 3 pages, 4 unnumbered pages of plates :

"Wen xian tong kao" shi Song Yuan zhi ji zhu ming xue zhe Ma Duanlin de zhong yao zhu zuo, shu de nei rong qi zi shang gu, zhong yu Nan Song Ningzong Jiading nian jian. Quan shu gong 348 juan, fen wei 24 men, fen bie wei: tian fu, qian bi, hu kou, zhi yi, zheng que, shi di, tu gong, guo yong, xuan ju, xue xiao, zhi guan, jiao she, zong miao, wang li, yue, bing, xing, jing ji, di xi, feng jian, xiang wei, wu yi, yu di, si yi. "Tong dian', "Tong zhi" he "Wen xian tong kao" san shu dou yi guan tong gu jin wei zhu zhi, gu hou ren he zhi cheng wei "San tong". "San tong" zai Zhongguo gu dai shi ji zhong zhan you fei chang zhong yao de di wei, er "Wen xian tong kao"shi ji "Tong dian", "Tong zhi "zhi hou, gui mo zui da de yi bu ji shu li dai dian zhang zhi du de zhu zuo. Dian xiao ben "Wen xian tong kao", yi Qia long shi er nian (1747 nian) Wu ying dian jiao kan ben wei di ben, yi Yu Qian bu xiu ben (jian cheng Yuan ben), Shenduzhai ben (jian cheng Shen ben), Feng Tianyu ben (jian cheng Feng ben), Guangxu er shi er nian Zhejiang shu ju (Jian cheng ju ben) ke ben wei jiao ben, bing cha yue "Tong kao" suo yong de qi ta shu ji, xi shou jin ren jiao kan cheng guo, fan jiao zheng e wu zhi chu, yu juan mo xie chu jiao kan ji. Zhe yang yi bu li shi dian ji de dian jiao zheng li chu ban bi jiang da da fang bian xue jie dui "Wen xian tong kao" yi shu de shi yong he xiang guan ling yu de yan jiu.

v. 1. Tian fu, qian bi, hu kou, zhi yi, zheng que, shi di -- v. 2. Tu gong, guo yong, xuan ju, xue xiao -- v. 3. Zhi guan -- v. 4. Jiao she -- v. 5. Zong miao, wang li -- v. 6. Wang li -- v. 7. Le -- v. 8. Bing, xing -- v. 9-10. Jing ji -- v. 11. Di xi, feng jian -- v. 12. Xiang wei, wu yi -- v. 13. Wu yi, yu di -- v. 14. Si yi.
马端臨著 ; 上海師範大學古籍研究所, 華東師範大學古籍研究所點校 ; [點校主持人裴汝誠, 戴建國, 嚴文儒].

《文献通考》是宋元之际著名学者马端临的重要著作, 书的内容起自上古, 终于南宋宁宗嘉定年间.全书共348卷, 分为24门, 分别为: 田赋, 钱币, 戶口, 职役, 征榷, 市籴, 土贡, 国用, 选举, 学校, 职官, 郊社, 宗庙, 王礼, 乐, 兵, 刑, 经籍, 帝系, 封建, 象纬, 物异, 舆地, 四裔. 《通典》, 《通志》和《文献通考》三书都以贯通古今为主旨, 故后人合之称为"三通". "三通"在中国古代史籍中占有非常重要的地位, 而《文献通考》是继《通典》, 《通志》之后, 规模最大的一部记述历代典章制度的著作.点校本《文献通考》, 以乾隆十二年(一七四七年)武英殿校刊本为底本, 以余谦补修本(简称元本), 慎独斋本(简称慎本), 冯天驭本(简称冯本), 光绪二十二年浙江书局(简称局本)刻本为校本, 并查阅"通考"所用的其它书籍, 吸收近人校勘成果, 凡校正讹误之处, 于卷末写出校勘记. 这样一部历史典籍的点校整理出版必将大大方便学界对《文献通考》一书的使用和相关领域的研究.

v. 1. 田赋, 钱币, 戶口, 职役, 征榷, 市籴 -- v. 2. 土贡, 国用, 选举, 学校 -- v. 3. 职官 -- v. 4. 郊社 -- v. 5 宗庙, 王礼 -- v. 6 王礼 -- v. 7 乐 -- v. 8. 兵, 刑 -- v. 9-10. 经籍 -- v. 11. 帝系, 封建 -- v. 12. 象纬, 物异 -- v. 13. 物异, 舆地 -- v. 14 四裔.

datafield.subfield: Shan ben bei tie guo yan lu /
本书是作者二十年来经手善本碑帖的笔记选编, 所选碑拓绝大部分为上海图书馆馆藏国家一二级文物, 资料价值极高. 撰写体例完备, 包括: 刻石年月、书撰者姓名、碑刻行款字数、刻石现存地、拓制年代鉴别、版本考证依据、拓本遞藏关系、题签题跋信息、尺寸、按语等. 每件碑拓均附有配图, 收图计950幅, 后附题跋人名索引, 计题跋者约280人.

datafield.subfield: Wang Dafang, Zhang Wenfang bian zhu.
Chiefly in Chinese; includes Mongolian (Preclassical script and romanized).

"Ben shu tong guo dui Menggu cao yuan di qu kao gu diao cha suo fa xian de Mng Yuan shi qi de shi bei he yin zhang deng jin shi lei wen wu de kao cha, pai zhao, ta yin yu yan jiu, feng fu le Meng Yuan shi qi Menggu cao yuan di qu de li shi, wei wo guo jin shi kao gu, gu ji zheng li, min zu yu yan wen zi yan jiu ti gong le zhong yao de xin cai liao"--From publisher.
王大方, 張文芳編著.
"本书通过对蒙古草原地区考古调查所发现的蒙元时期的石碑和印章等金石类文物的考察、拍照、拓印与研究, 丰富了蒙元时期蒙古草原地区的历史, 为我国金石考古、古籍整理、民族语言文字研究提供了重要的新材料"--From publisher.

datafield.subfield: Ancient settlement systems and cultures in the Ram Hormuz Plain, Southwestern Iran :
excavations at Tall-e Geser and regional survey of the Ram Hormuz area /
by Abbas Alizadeh ; with contributions by Loghman Ahmadzadeh and Mehdi Omidfar.

After a decade-long hiatus in the years of World War II, archaeological fieldwork was resumed in Iran in 1948. In that year, the Oriental Institute returned to its long tradition of archaeological research by sending Donald McCown to the lowlands of southwestern Iran to conduct a series of surface surveys to find a multi-period site for excavation. For his survey, McCown chose the Ram Hormuz region, southeast of lowland Susiana and the region south and east of the provincial town of Ahvaz down to the Persian Gulf. McCown recorded 118 sites in the Ram Hormuz and Ahvaz areas and eventually chose for excavation the large prehistoric mound complex Tall-e Geser. In Part 1 of this two-part volume, Abbas Alizadeh and colleagues have undertaken a final publication of the site. -- publisher's description.
Includes bibliographical references (pages xxix-xxxix) and index.
Geology, geography, and climate of the Ram Hormuz region --
Overview of excavations at the Tall-e Geser complex --
Archaeological survey in the Ram Hormuz plain, 2005-2008.
Archaeological survey in the Ram Hormuz plain --
INAA analysis of ceramics from Tall-e Geser and Abu Fanduweh : compositional signatures and evidence for ceramic interchange /
John R. Alden, Leah Minc, and Abbas Alizadeh --
Bituminous mixtures of Tall-e Geser : a diversified origin of bitumen /
Jacques Connan, John Zumberge, and Kendra Imbus --
Gazetteer of the Ram Hormuz surveyed sites and settlement size tables.
Shelby White and Leon Levy Program for Archaeological Publications (Firm)
University of Chicago Oriental Institute publications ;

桂阳刘家岭宋代壁画墓 /
湖南省文物考古研究所编 = Liujialing mural tomb in Guiyang / by Hunan Provincial Institute of Archaeology and Cultural Relics.
桂阳浏家岭宋代壁画墓发掘于2010年, 是湖南省第一座经科学发掘的古代壁画墓. 该墓发掘的最大收获是发现了内容丰富精美的壁画、地画, 墓中的出土器物也很独特. 通过对人骨架分析, 墓主为女性, 推测此墓的年代为北宋晚期, 下限应不到南宋.
湖南省文物考古研究所,

datafield.subfield: Dongguan Haogang yi zhi bo wu guan bian ; Ma Xiaoqi zhu bian.
Dongguan Haogang yi zhi bo wu guan,
东莞蚝岗遗址博物馆编 ; 马小其主编.
本书是南城历史文化遗产成果汇编, 集中展示了南城的文化遗产 (古遗址、古墓葬、古建筑以及金石文物等相关遗迹遗物) 和相关历史文化资料, 对于研究地方史具有一定的学术价值.

marc:datafield.marc:subfield: Institute for the Study of the Ancient World,

datafield.subfield: 1959-2001 nian kao gu fa jue bao gao /
Zhongguo she hui ke xue yuan kao gu yan jiu suo bian = Sui-Tang Luoyang City : Archaeological excavations in 1959-2001 / by The Institute of Archaeology, Chinese Academy of Social Sciences.
1959-2001 nian kao gu fa jue bao gao
Zhongguo tian ye kao gu bao gao ji. kao gu xue zhuan kan. ding zhong ;

Ben shu xiang xi bao dao liao 1959-2001 nian dui sui tang Luoyang cheng yi zhi jin xing kao gu fa jue de zhong yao cheng guo, nei rong han gai cheng qiang, cheng men, jie dao, li fang, gong dian, yuan lin, shui xi deng. tong guo 40 duo nian de kao gu gong zuo, ji ben nong qing liao sui tang Luoyang cheng de ping mian bu ju, li shi yan ge he jian zhu feng mao, dui yu yan jiu sui tang shi qi de li shi yi ji Zhongguo gu dai du cheng zhi du ju you zhong yao de yi yi.
Zhongguo she hui ke xue yuan.
中国社会科学院考古研究所编 = Sui-Tang Luoyang City : Archaeological excavations in 1959-2001 / by The Institute of Archaeology, Chinese Academy of Social Sciences.
中国田野考古报告集. 考古学专刊. 丁种 ;
本书详细报道了1959-2001年对隋唐洛阳城遗址进行考古发掘的重要成果, 内容涵盖城墙、城门、街道、里坊、宮殿、园林、水系等. 通过40多年的考古工作, 基本弄清了隋唐洛阳城的平面布局、历史沿革和建筑风貌, 对于研究隋唐时期的历史以及中国古代都城制度具有重要的意义.
Zhongguo tian ye kao gu bao gao ji.

昌邑市博物馆编 ; 主编刘乃贤 ; 执行主编王伟波.
本书为昌邑地区第三次全国文物普查的成果结集. 全书分为遗址, 墓葬, 古代建筑等五个部分, 全面介绍了此次普查的成果.

datafield.subfield: Anyang chuan tong jian zhu xiu shan yu yan jiu /
vii, 227 pages, 40 unnumbered pages of plates :
安阳传统建筑修缮与研究 /
本书收录了"安阳古城勘察记"、"河南安阳农贸公司晚唐壁画墓发掘简报"、"安阳何以成为国家级历史文化名城"、"安阳历史文化资源保护与开发研究"、"试论安阳古城的保护与改造"、"谈安阳的地下文物钻探"等多篇安阳古建筑修缮和对安阳传统建筑的论述.

Beijing Shi wen wu yan jiu suo bian zhu.
Beijing wen wu yu kao gu xi lie cong shu
Beijing Shi wen wu yan jiu suo,
北京龙泉务窑辽代瓷器科技研究 /
北京市文物研究所编著.
北京文物与考古系列丛书
"本研究使用元素分析技术, 物相分析技术, 色差分析技术, 热分析技术和显微分析技术, 对北京龙泉务窑辽代瓷器的胎釉成分, 物相组成, 色度指标, 烧制温度和微观形态特征进行了全面细致的测试分析, 对陶瓷考古中胎釉的化学组成, 原料处理, 施釉工艺, 装烧工艺等的热点问题进行了认真探讨, 为我国辽代瓷器的深入研究提供了新的材料"--Publisher.
Beijing wen wu yu kao gu xi lie cong shu.
北京文物与考古系列丛书.

datafield.subfield: Zhongguo wen wu yan jiu suo, Xinjiang Weiwu'er Zizhiqu bo wu guan, Wuhan da xue li shi xi bian ; Tang Changru zhu bian.
Jing xiao Xin hua shu dian,

Ben shu you qian guo jia wen wu ju gu wen xian yan jiu shi (xian gai ming zhong guo wen wu yan jiu suo wen wu gu wen xian yan jiu bu), xin jiang bo wu guan, wu han da xue li shi xi xie zuo zheng li bian ji. jian zhuang ben (10 ce) yi yu 1981-1991 nian lu xu chu ban. ben shu wei tu wen dui zhao ben, bian pai yu jian zhuang ben lue you bu tong.
Zhongguo wen wu yan jiu suo.
Xinjiang Weiwu'er Zizhiqu bo wu guan.

datafield.subfield: The Babylonian correspondence of Esarhaddon, and letters to Assurbanipal and Sin-Šarru- Iškun from northern and central Babylonia /
edited by Frances Reynolds ; with contributions by Simo Parpola ; illustrations edited by Julian Reade.
Text of correspondence in Akkadian (romanized) with English translation.
Includes bibliographical references (pages xxxvi-xxxviii) and indexes.

This volume of Babylonian letters from Nineveh contains letters which can be dated to the reign of Esarhaddon, and letters from northern and central Babylonia datable to the reign of Assurbanipal or later kings. Most of the letters are addressed to the Assyrian king and are important primary sources for reconstructing the history of Babylonia and Assyria during the reigns of Esarhaddon and Assurbanipal in the seventh century B.C.
Babylonian correspondence of Esarhaddon, and letters to Assurbanipal and Sin-Šarru- Iškun from northern and central Babylonia.

datafield.subfield: How Effectively do ‘Top-Down’ Participatory Management Initiatives for Turkey’s Archaeological Areas Merge with ‘Bottom-up’ Management Practices? A Çatalhöyük Case Study /
Evaluating Çatalhöyük : Economic and Ethnographic Approaches to Understanding the Impact of Cultural Heritage /
Going Back, Looking Forward : Reflexive Archaeology or Reflexive Method? /
Landscape and Taskscape at Çatalhöyük: An Integrated Perspective /
Michael Charles, Chris Doherty, Eleni Asouti, Amy Bogaard, Elizabeth Henton, Clark Spencer Larsen, Christopher B. Ruff, Philippa Ryan, Joshua W. Sadvari & Katheryn C. Twiss --
Of Bins, Basins and Banquets : Storing, Handling and Sharing at Neolithic Çatalhöyük /
G. Arzu Demirergi, Katheryn C. Twiss, Amy Bogaard, Laura Green, Philippa Ryan & Shahina Farid --
Bringing Down the House : House Closing Deposits at Çatalhöyük /
Nerissa Russell, Katherine I. Wright, Tristan Carter, Sheena Ketchum, Philippa Ryan, Nurcan Yalman, Roddy Reagan, Mirjana Stevanović & Marina Milić --
Assessing Outdoor Activities and Their Social Implications at Çatalhöyük /
Amy Bogaard, Philippa Ryan, Nurcan Yalman, Eleni Asouti, Katheryn C. Twiss, Camilla Mazzucato & Shahina Farid --
Mosaics and Networks : The Social Geography at Çatalhöyük /
Temporal Trends: The Shapes and Narratives of Cultural Change at Çatalhöyük /
Ian Hodder with contributions by Chris Doherty --
Dress : A Preliminary Study of Bodily Ornamentation at Çatalhöyük /
Milena Vasić, Roseleen Bains & Nerissa Russell with contributions by Danielle Bar-Yosef, Lynn Meskell & Carolyn Nakamura --

"The Neolithic site of Çatalhöyük in Turkey has been world famous since the 1960s when excavations revealed the large size and dense occupation of the settlement, as well as the spectacular wall paintings and reliefs uncovered inside the houses. Since 1993 an international team of archaeologists, led by Ian Hodder, has been carrying out new excavations and research, in order to shed more light on the people who inhabited the site. The present volume discusses general themes that have emerged in the analysis and interpretation of the results of excavations in 2000-2008. It synthesizes the results of research described in other volumes in the same series."--Page 4 of cover.
Monograph (British Institute of Archaeology at Ankara) ;

I. Treaties -- Treaty between a king of Hatti and Paddatissu of Kizzuwatna -- Treaty between Tudhaliya II of Hatti and Sunashshura of Kizzuwatna -- Treaty between Suppiluliuma I of Hatti and Huqqana of Hayasa -- Treaty between Suppiluliuma I of Hatti and Niqmaddu II of Ugarit -- Treaty between Suppiluliuma I of Hatti and Aziru of Amurru -- Treaty between Suppiluliuma I of Hatti and Shattiwaza of Mittanni -- Treaty between Shattiwaza of Mittanni and Suppiluliuma I of Hatti -- Treaty between Suppiluliuma I of Hatti and Tuppi-Teshshup of Amurru -- Treaty between Mursili II of Hatti and Niqmepa of Ugarit -- Treaty between Mursili II of Hatti and Targasnalli of Hapalla -- Treaty between Mursili II of Hatti and Kapanta-Kurunta of Mira-Kuwaliya -- Treaty between Mursili II of Hatti and Manapa-Tarhunta of the Land of the Seha River --

Treaty between Muwattalli II of Hatti and Alaksandu of Wilusa -- Treaty between Muwattalli II of Hatti and Talmi-Sharrumma of Aleppo -- Treaty between Hattusili III of Hatti and Ramses II of Egypt -- Treaty Between Hattusili II of Hatti and Benteshina of Amurru -- Treaty between Tudhaliya IV of Hatti and Shaushga-muwa of Amurru -- Edict of Hattusili III of Hatti concerning military obligations of Kurunta of Tarhuntassa -- Treaty between Hattusili II of Hatti and Ulmi-Teshshup of Tarhuntassa -- Treaty between Tudhaliya IV of Hatti and Kurunta of Tarhuntassa.

II. Diplomatic correspondence -- Letter from Suppiluliuma I of Hatti to Niqmaddu II of Ugarit -- Copy of letter from Sharri-Kushuh of Carchemish to Niqmaddu II of Ugarit -- Letter from Prince Piha-walwi of Hatti to Ibiranu of Ugarit -- Letter from Prince Sutahapshap of Egypt to Hattusili II of Hatti -- Letter from Queen Naptera of Egypt to Puduhepa of Hatti -- Letter from Ramses II of Egypt to Prince Tashmi-Sharrumma of Hatti -- Letter from Ramses II of Egypt to Kupanta-Kurunta of Mira-Kuwaliya -- Letter from Queen Puduhepa of Hatti to Ramses II of Egypt -- Letter from Ramses II of Egypt to Puduhepa of Hatti -- Letter from Ramses II of Egypt to Hattusli III of Hatti -- Letter from Hattusili III of Hatti to Kadashman-Enlil II of Babylon -- Letter from Urhi-Teshshup(?) of Hatti to Adad-nirari I of Assyria -- Letter from Hattusili III of Hatti to Adad-nirari I of Assyria -- Letter from Tudhaliya IV of Hatti to an Assyrian nobleman -- Letter from a king of Hanigalbat to a king of Hatti -- Letter from Mashuiluwa of Mira-Kuwaliya to Mursili I of Hatti --

III. Miscellaneous texts -- Indictment of Madduwatta by Arnuwanda I of Hatti -- Edict of Suppiluliuma I of Hatti concerning the tribute of Ugarit -- Inventory of Ugaritic tribute to Hatti -- Edicts of Mursili II of Hatti recognizing the status of Piyassili of Carchemish -- Arbitration of Syrian disputes of Mursili II of Hatti -- Edict of Mursili II of Hatti concerning the frontiers of Ugarit -- Edicts of Mursili II of Hatti concerning the tribute of Ugarit -- Edicts of Hattusili III of Hatti concerning the merchants of Ura at Ugarit -- Edict of Hattusili III of Hatti concerning fugitives from Ugarit -- Edicts of Puduhepa of Hatti concerning shipping losses at Ugarit -- Edict of Ini-Teshshup of Carchemish concerning the banishment of the brothers of Ammistamru II of Ugarit -- Edict of Tudhaliya IV of Hatti concerning the divorce of Ammistamru II of Ugarit -- Edict of Ini-Teshshup of Carchemish concerning the divorce of Ammistamru II of Ugarit -- Edict of Tudhaliya IV of Hatti releasing Ammistamru II of Ugarit from participation in war against Assyria -- Edict of Talmi-Teshshup of Carchemish returning property to Ammurapi of Ugarit -- Edict of Talmi-Teshshup of Carchemish returning dowry to Ehli-Nikkalu -- Letter of Talmi-Teshshup of Carchemish to Ammurapi of Ugarit concerning his divorce.
